name: Time Express - The Game
description:
Time Express - The Game

Timexpress is at first a railway simulation, but also it will become an adventure.
Get your first engine and your first waggons, drive through different levels and explore your own world, help to build up Steam Valley ... there will be many things you can do.

This is the release of this game, version 0.0.03
Chapter one:  Get your first train.

Wanna know more about the first steps in the game ?
Look about the story at 

http://blender-games.de

or

Follow timexpress on Twitter

Requirements: 4 GB Ram, bests results with Nvidia Graphics.
Intel chips will not work properly sometimes with this game.

You will download Timexpress_0.0.03.zip,  the latest Release

.

It contains the first chapter,  where you have to do several quests, until you get access to the Hall of Train, where you get your first locomotive and your first 3 waggons.
After doing so, you have 5 levels for driving through, to explore the first parts of your world and learning to drive a train.

The game is still in progress. so don´t forget:
Once installed it, get the latest updates from

http://blender-games.de

While starting the game, you will find an option for calling play instructions.

Language you can change between english and german.
With tab "F" you can change screensize.
While running the game, you can change these options in the menue

All game updates from

http://blender-games.de

 are for free.
Install them in the same folder where you have installed the game.

If you have installed an earlier Demoversion, dont install the game in this folder !
Delete the demo or create a new folder.

The game is designed for using a controller. But if you have no controller, you can play it with keyboard too. Read for this the play instructions.

Be patient, when you start the game for the first time. It needs a little bit of time for setting all lights in the game.

More information and videos from this game you´ll find at

www.blender-games.de

Some important at last:
 The game is tested out in any way. But nobody is perfect.
If you have any problems with this game, find some bugs, etc
Please  send an email to support@gerrys-music.de

And I´ll try to help you.

And now, wish you have fun and enjoy this game :-)
